insList.prompt: The user is unclear or unsure about the provided answer, please clarify.
Reflect on this text and offer more options.
Find any alternatives from this text.
Condense this text by removing duplicate or repetitive information.
Please provide relevant background information on this topic.
Compare this information with other known or opposing concepts.
Confirm the source or accuracy of this information.
Provide arguments against the points made in this text.
Offer examples to clarify this point.
Please rephrase this text to avoid jargon or to clarify meaning.
Categorize the points made in this text.
What are the potential consequences or implications of this information?
Restructure the following text as a tree. Clearly mark each level and sublevel for simple parsing by the user's tooling.
Arrange this information by order of importance or relevance.
